meanings.definition: Guidance or instructions on how to do something
meanings.sent1: I followed the directions to bake a cake.
meanings.sent2: She always gives clear directions when explaining things.
meanings.sent3: The directions on the shampoo bottle said to lather, rinse, and repeat.
meanings.sent4: His directions for success were like a roadmap to achieving your goals.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's directions were like a beacon guiding us through the assignment.

meanings.definition: The course or path along which something moves or points
meanings.sent1: The directions on the map led us to the park.
meanings.sent2: The compass needle pointed in the right directions.
meanings.sent3: The directions of the wind made the kite fly high in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed in the directions of the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The arrow showed the directions in which to go for the treasure hunt.

meanings.definition: The position towards which someone or something faces or moves
meanings.sent1: She turned in all directions to find her lost keys.
meanings.sent2: The cat's directions were fixed on the moving toy.
meanings.sent3: The directions of the sun made the room warm and cozy.
meanings.sent4: His directions were always towards progress and growth.
meanings.sent5: The compass always points in the directions of the North Pole.
